Steps.StepString: Visiting the provided URL to view the website contents
Finding and downloading a file named configs.zip on the webpage

Substeps.SubstepString: Find the file named configs.zip on the webpage.

Steps.StepString: Extracting the configs.zip file and analyzing the file named apache_ctf.conf
Identifying a rule within the configuration file that replaces any 'secret' tags with the word 'Protected'

Substeps.SubstepString: Identify the rule within the configuration file.
Replace any 'secret' tags with the word 'Protected'.

Steps.StepString: Making a GET request to /secret.html and observing that the contents of 'secret' tags are replaced with 'Protected'

Substeps.SubstepString: Observe that the contents of 'secret' tags are replaced with 'Protected'.

Steps.StepString: Exfiltrating the original /secret.html page by making a GET request with a 'Range' HTTP header

Substeps.SubstepString: Make a GET request with a 'Range' HTTP header to exfiltrate the original /secret.html page.

Steps.StepString: Observing within the content of the page that there is a 'secret' tag which contains the flag

Substeps.SubstepString: Observe within the content of the page.
Identify the 'secret' tag which contains the flag.
